mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT HASHTAG, COUNT(HASHTAG) AS COUNT FROM TABLE_GH WHERE ((CAST(SYSTIMESTAMP AS DATE) - DATE '1970-01-01') * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000 + MOD( EXTRACT( SECOND FROM SYSTIMESTAMP ), 1 ) * 1000 - 32400000) - INPUT_DATE < 86400000 GROUP BY HASHTAG ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT DISTINCT HASHTAG FROM TABLE_GH WHERE GROUP_ID = #{group_id}
SELECT GROUP_ID FROM TABLE_GH WHERE HASHTAG = #{hashtag}
